values.value: function sortByProperty(objArray, prop, direction){ if (arguments.length<2) throw new Error("ARRAY, AND OBJECT PROPERTY MINIMUM ARGUMENTS, OPTIONAL DIRECTION"); if (!Array.isArray(objArray)) throw new Error("FIRST ARGUMENT NOT AN ARRAY"); const clone = objArray.slice(0); const direct = arguments.length>2 ? arguments[2] : 1; const propPath = (prop.constructor===Array) ? prop : prop.split("."); clone.sort(function(a,b){ for (let p in propPath){ if (a[propPath[p]] && b[propPath[p]]){ a = a[propPath[p]]; b = b[propPath[p]]; } } a = a.match(/^\d+$/) ? +a : a; b = b.match(/^\d+$/) ? +b : b; return ( (a < b) ? -1*direct : ((a > b) ? 1*direct : 0) ); }); return clone; }
